mapper.insert: insert into comments (comment_idx, bo_idx, class_idx, user_idx, comm_parent_idx, comm_content, comm_writedate, comm_role) values(#{comment_idx.nextval},#{bo_idx},#{class_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{comm_parent_idx}, #{comm_content}, #{sysdate},#{comm_role})
mapper.select: select comment_idx, bo_idx, class_idx, user_idx, comm_parent_idx, comm_content, comm_writedate, comm_role from comments where comment_idx = #{comment_idx}
select comment_idx, bo_idx, class_idx, user_idx, comm_parent_idx, comm_content, comm_role, comm_writedate from comments where comment_idx > 0 order by comment_idx desc
